front.title: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCPv4 and DHCPv6) Options for Mobility Servers (MoS)

abstract.t: This document defines a number of Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP-for-IPv4) options that contain a list of domain names or IPv4 addresses that can be mapped to servers providing Mobility Services. Mobility Services are used to assist an MN in handover preparation (network discovery) and handover decision (network selection). The services addressed by this document are the Media Independent Handover Services defined in [1].
